videos.headline: Smart: 'We couldn't get any rhythm in the second quarter'
videos.description: Georgia head coach Kirby Smart explains that the team did not play their best game today and that "responsibility starts and falls on me."

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Presser (Smart: 'We couldn't get any rhythm in the second quarter') 2018/10/13

videos.headline: Orgeron: 'We knew we had to play our best ball'
videos.description: LSU head coach Ed Orgeron and quarterback Joe Burrow discuss the positive energy the team showed throughout their win against Georgia.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Interview (Orgeron: 'We knew we had to play our best ball') 2018/10/13
